text: I'm someone who's into scientific research. I've recently discovered a theory of balance. Before all the wise men in the world I feel my theory of balance. When a door opens, the equidistant door, on the other side of the world, closes irrevocably. That's why, and we've all seen it, all of a sudden, the doors close themselves. The day all the doors opened at once, the world would be filled with holes and the wind would enter them and take the earth through the boundless spaces...
title: Teoría de las puertas
author: Luis Vidales
